p: Our uncertainty analysis is conducted based on C 4MIP and CMIP3 to allow comparison with the MAGICC 6.0 results (Meinshausen et al. 2011a, b). A newer model inter-comparison, CMIP5, was released in 2013 (Taylor et al. 2011) for the Fifth Assessment Report (AR5) of the IPCC. It is reported that the mean values and ranges of the GMT changes simulated by the CMIP5 and CMIP3 models are generally consistent [Box TS.6 of IPCC ( 2013)]. Hence, using the CMIP5 models would not substantially affect our conclusions.
